alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from dissipating thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 558 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hanover to 17 miles east of Pinon to 6 miles northeast of Pueblo Depot. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strongest winds may occur with little to no precipitation or lightning.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
